duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage and organize general office management and office filing systems, including record retention and mail management.
Coordinate travel plans, including scheduling, itineraries, and travel expense reports.
Provide high-quality administrative support for the preparation of organization charts, reports, communication, correspondence, and presentations.
Maintain and follow-up on assignments and requested information, interacting with executives and staff at all levels.
Interface with union workers to ensure facilities issues are addressed and resolved.
Responsible for maintaining department supplies, electronic timekeeping, and confidential management of sensitive information.
Represent the office in a professional manner and interface effectively with employees at all levels, demonstrating strong communication and interpersonal skills.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree preferred, but not required
